Package lumis.portal.rest

This package implements the REST support on the Lumis Portal.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseRestServletContainer
    Base REST Servlet container implementation, containing common implementation of portal's REST containers.
    ConstraintViolationExceptionMapper
    Default portal exception mapper for ConstraintViolationException.
    CustomMoxyJsonProvider
    A customized MOXyJsonProvider, enhancing some aspects of it.
    PortalAsyncContextDelegateProvider
    Portal custom AsyncContextDelegateProvider implementation, for allowing Jersey to run in both 3.0 and 2.5 Servlet Containers (2.5 without Async support).
    PortalDefaultExceptionMapper
    Lumis Portal's default exception mapper for REST.
    RestApplication
    Lumis Portal built-in REST application.
    RestJSON
    Class that represents the JSON type used in REST.
    RestRootFilter
    Filter that provides access to REST mapped resources based on root path and automatically uses classes in deployed modules properly annotated.
    RestServletApplication
    Servlet that provides access to Lumis Portal built-in REST operations.
    RestXMLFragment
    Class that represents the XML fragment to be used in REST.

Package lumis.portal.rest Description

This package implements the REST support on the Lumis Portal.
Since:
6.1.0
